domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Brand Vertical
domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

domain.name: Brand Category
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical
domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: Russian authorities target Chinese nationals with raids and facial recognition technology amid coronavirus fears
entity.description: According to the Associated Press, authorities in Moscow are tracking Chinese nationals and conducting raids as part of their virus prevention strategy. Transportation workers were also ordered to notify police if passengers who might be from China boarded. Some critics have called the strategy a form of racial profiling rather than an effective method to control the spread of the disease.

text: @PreetBharara If someone says the slight chance of coronavirus, I’m worried about when they find out about actual children in cages, Russia influencing our election, alarming wealth imbalance, people having health insurance taken away, soaring deficit, and an actual authoritarian ruler.
